title: Audit Trail
description: Information related to the creation and the modifications of an entity.

xdm:modifiedOn.title: Modified On
xdm:modifiedOn.description:
Last modification date of the entity.
At creation time, `modifiedOn` is set as `createdOn`.

xdm:createdByUserID.title: Created by User Identifier
xdm:createdByUserID.description: User id who has created the entity.

xdm:modifiedByUserID.title: Modified by User Identifier
xdm:modifiedByUserID.description:
User id who last modified the entity.
At creation time, `modifiedByUser` is set as `createdByUser`.

xdm:createdByBatchID.title: Created by Batch Identifier
xdm:createdByBatchID.description: The Data Set Files in Catalog Services which has been originating the creation of the entity.

xdm:modifiedByBatchID.title: Modified by Batch Identifier
xdm:modifiedByBatchID.description:
The last Data Set Files in Catalog Services which has modified the entity.
At creation time, `modifiedByBatchId` is set as `createdByBatchId`.
